Text:
Hey Bob,
I really appreciate your uploads of the chiefs games.

Please seed.

Please reseed the chiefs vs. vikings game
Please.

How do I play these files...? In real one (which plays AVI) only audio is showing up, same with the other games!!!!!!!! please guys.. My bro wants to watch these PLEASE!!! which program.. all I am doing is DoubleClicking it.. and it opens in REal and tell me.. it wont play video... really dumb.. please help

In order to play this, please use Windows Media Player classic and install the latest FFDSHOW to play back content encoded in the H264 codec:

http://www.free-codecs.com/download/FFDShow.htm
Use the VLC player from Video Lan.  It's free, requires no external codecs, and plays just about everything.
